title: Investing in Crypto in 2025? Cardano (ADA) Ethereum (ETH) and Mutuum Finance (MUTM) could be leading long-term bets

title: iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT) Shares Acquired by Scotia Capital Inc.
description: Scotia Capital Inc. increased its position in iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT - Free Report) by 27.7% in the fourth quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the SEC.
